info.augendre.perm_maker.data

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • info.augendre.perm_maker.data.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Task
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A task is something a resource may be assigned to, in order to be completed. A task may repeat itself multiple times in a week.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • Task

        public Task()
        Constructs a default task.
        • Empty string for label
        • Empty set for days
        • Midnight as start and end time
        • No (0) resource needed
        • Empty map of assigned resources

      • Task

        public Task(String label,
            Set<DayOfWeek> days,
            LocalTime startTime,
            LocalTime endTime,
            int numberOfResources)
        Constructs a task given the parameters.
        Parameters:
        label - The task's label.
        days - The task's occurrences in the week.
        startTime - The task's start time.
        endTime - The task's end time.
        numberOfResources - The number of resources needed for the task.
